Episodes.Title: Those Kinds of Things
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In the Season 6 premiere, Dexter attends his high school reunion to hunt a former Prom King; an investigation into a faith-based murder causes Dexter to ask some spiritual questions; Debra becomes an unexpected hero.

Episodes.Title: Once Upon a Time...
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: To solve a macabre murder, Homicide consults Brother Sam, a minister whom Dexter recognizes as a fellow killer with an even better cover than his own; now a local hero, Debra is surprised by two life-changing proposals.

Episodes.Title: Smokey and the Bandit
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Manny Coto
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is confronted with a glimpse of his own possible future when a serial killer from his past reappears; Debra is uncomfortable in her new job; Travis and Gellar prepare a new twisted tableau.

Episodes.Title: A Horse of a Different Color
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Lauren Gussis
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Disturbing events cause Dexter to lean on Brother Sam during a crisis of faith, while Debra gives her first press conference on the new religiously motivated serial killer.

Episodes.Title: The Angel of Death
Episodes.Plot: The search for the Doomsday Killers takes Dexter in a new direction; Batista and Quinn pay a visit to the university where Professor Gellar taught; due to departmental regulations following the shooting, Debra is forced to begin t...

Episodes.Title: Just Let Go
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Jace Richdale
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter becomes caught up in a very personal case that awakens the needs of his Dark Passenger; Debra feels overwhelmed by her new duties, and discovers a disturbing secret about Quinn.

Episodes.Title: Nebraska
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Wendy West
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter teams up with a fellow Dark Passenger when he takes a road trip to Nebraska; Debra deals with the complications of her promotion as she leads the Doomsday investigation.

Episodes.Title: Sin of Omission
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Arika Lisanne Mittman
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter uses lessons he learned from Brother Sam to follow up on some new Doomsday leads; Debra butts heads with LaGuerta over the case of a dead call girl.

Episodes.Title: Get Gellar
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Karen Campbell
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter receives help from an unexpected source while hunting the Doomsday Killers; Debra makes a self-discovery in therapy.

Episodes.Title: Ricochet Rabbit
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Jace Richdale
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter tries to figure out the Doomsday Killers' next victim; Debra has a strong reaction to a crime scene, leading her to realize that she leans too heavily on her brother.

Episodes.Title: Talk to the Hand
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Manny Coto
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: Dexter finds that in order to catch the Doomsday Killers, he must create a macabre tableau of his own; Debra's battle with LaGuerta boils over, and her therapist makes an unnerving suggestion.

Episodes.Title: This Is the Way the World Ends
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, Desmond Harrington
Episodes.Plot: In the Season 6 finale, Dexter and Homicide race a solar eclipse to catch the Doomsday Killers before their final gruesome act; Debra struggles with a new emotional reality.
